purposeDescriptions.low: causes affected flammable objects to burst into rapidly sprouting seeds once ignited
purposeDescriptions.mid: causes affected flammable objects to violently explode into rapidly sprouting seeds once ignited
purposeDescriptions.high: causes affected flammable objects to violently explode into a fragmentation bomb of high-velocity seeds once ignited
purposeDescriptions.invLow: greatly reduces the detonation speed of nearby explosives for a short few minutes
purposeDescriptions.invMid: completely nullifies nearby explosive materials for about half an hour
purposeDescriptions.invHigh: permanently defuses nearby explosive materials, causing them to sprout wild viney growths
